title: Wifi instability
content: I am having serious issue with my pixel 2xl..wifi is keep disconnecting again and again and it's happening within 10 min time period..I have checked same when safe mode is enabled,,i am facing same issue.it is so annoying and frustrating.i have also done "forget and re connect my wifi" but no help..also I have checked my wifi connectivity with OnePlus 6 and Nokia 7 plus and laptop, I am not facing such issue with these devices.please help......
